Camper API

Backend API for the Camper application to manage bootcamps, courses, users, and authentication.

  • Bootcamps
    • Get All Bootcamps
    • Get Single Bootcamp
    • Get Bootcamps By Distance
    • Create New Bootcamp
    • Update Bootcamp
    • Delete Bootcamp
  • Courses
    • Get All Courses
    • Get Courses By Bootcamp
    • Get Single Course
    • Create New Course
    • Update Course
    • Delete Course
  • Authentication
    • Register User
    • Login User
    • Get Logged in User via Token
    • Logout User
    • Forgot Password

Bootcamps 6

Bootcamps CRUD functionality

raw

Get All Bootcamps  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/bootcamps

Description

Fetch all bootcamps from database. Includes pagination, filtering, etc.

Get Single Bootcamp  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/bootcamps/{{BOOTCAMP_ID}}

Description

Get single bootcamp by id

raw

Get Bootcamps By Distance  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/bootcamps/radius/{{zipcode}}/{{distance}}

Description

Get bootcamps within a radius of a specific zipcode.

raw

Create New Bootcamp  |  POST   {{URL}}/api/v1/bootcamps

Description

Add new bootcamp to database. Must be authenticated and must be publisher/admin.

Headers
Key Value Description
Content-Type application/json
Body
{ "name": "Devworks Bootcamp 2", "description": "Devworks is a full stack JavaScript Bootcamp located in the heart of Boston that focuses on the technologies you need to get a high paying job as a web developer", "website": "https://devworks.com", "phone": "(111) 111-1111", "email": "enroll@devworks.com", "address": "233 Bay State Rd Boston MA 02215", "careers": ["Web Development", "UI/UX", "Business"], "housing": true, "jobAssistance": true, "jobGuarantee": false, "acceptGi": true }
raw

Update Bootcamp  |  PUT   {{URL}}/api/v1/bootcamps/{{BOOTCAMP_ID}}

Description

Update bootcamp in database by id. Must be authenticated and must be publisher/admin.

Headers
Key Value Description
Content-Type application/json
Body
{ "name": "New bootcamp name" }
raw

Delete Bootcamp  |  DELETE   {{URL}}/api/v1/bootcamps/{{BOOTCAMP_ID}}

Description

Delete a bootcamp from database by id. Must be authenticated and must be publisher/admin.

Courses 6

Courses CRUD functionality

raw

Get All Courses  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/courses

Description

Fetch all bootcamps from database. Includes pagination, filtering, etc.

raw

Get Courses By Bootcamp  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/bootcamps/{{BOOTCAMP_ID}}/courses

Description

Fetch all bootcamps from database. Includes pagination, filtering, etc.

Get Single Course  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/courses/{{COURSE_ID}}

Description

Get a single course by ID

raw

Create New Course  |  POST   {{URL}}/api/v1/bootcamps/{{BOOTCAMP_ID}}/courses

Description

Add new course to a bootcamp. Must be authenticated and must be publisher/admin.

Headers
Key Value Description
Content-Type application/json
Body
{ "title": "Full Stack Web Development 2", "description": "In this course you will learn full stack web development, first learning all about the frontend with HTML/CSS/JS/Vue and then the backend with Node.js/Express/MongoDB", "weeks": 12, "tuition": 10000, "minimumSkill": "intermediate", "scholarhipsAvailable": true, "bootcamp": "62319d135553fe11ab2b5883", "user": "5d7a514b5d2c12c7449be045" }
raw

Update Course  |  PUT   {{URL}}/api/v1/courses/{{COURSE_ID}}

Description

Update a course by id. Must be authenticated and must be publisher/admin.

Headers
Key Value Description
Content-Type application/json
Body
{ "scholarshipAvailable": true }

Delete Course  |  DELETE   {{URL}}/api/v1/courses/{{COURSE_ID}}

Description

Delete a course by its id. Must be authenticated and must be publisher/admin.

Authentication 5

Routes for user authentication including register, sign in, reset password, etc.

raw

Register User  |  POST   {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/register

Description

Add user to database with encrypted password

Headers
Key Value Description
Content-Type application/json
Body
{ "name": "moaaz", "email": "moaaz_bs@yahoo.com", "password": "harry228", "role": "publisher" }
raw

Login User  |  POST   {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/login

Description

Log user in with email and password

Headers
Key Value Description
Content-Type application/json
Body
{ "email": "john@gmail.com", "password": "123456" }
raw

Get Logged in User via Token  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/me

Description

Get user’s details via authentication token

raw

Logout User  |  GET   {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/logout

Description

Log user out and clear cookies

raw

Forgot Password  |  POST   {{URL}}/api/v1/auth/forgotpassword

Description

Generate password token and send email

Headers
Key Value Description
Content-Type application/json
Body
{ "email": "john@gmail.com" }
